code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Filter(_ref){var setActive=_ref.setActive,activeButton=_ref.activeButton,setFiltered=_ref.setFiltered,data=_ref.data;useEffect(function(){if(activeButton==='all'){setFiltered(data);return;}var filtered=data.filter(function(item){return item.type.includes(activeButton);});setFiltered(filtered);},[activeButton]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:activeButton==='all'?"active":"list",onClick:function onClick(){return setActive('all');},children:"All"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:activeButton==='UI/UX'?"active":"list",onClick:function onClick(){return setActive('UI/UX');},children:"UI/UX"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:activeButton==='Website'?"active":"list",onClick:function onClick(){return setActive('Website');},children:"Website"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:activeButton==='Coding'?"active":"list",onClick:function onClick(){return setActive('Coding');},children:"Coding"})]});}
